Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.communication

Class AbstractCommunicationModule<ConfigT extends AbstractCommunicationModuleConfiguration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.communication.AbstractCommunicationModule<ConfigT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommunicationModule<ConfigT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdHocModule, CellModule
    public abstract class AbstractCommunicationModule<ConfigT extends AbstractCommunicationModuleConfiguration>
extends Object
implements CommunicationModule<ConfigT>
    Generic AbstractCommunicationModule for a AbstractSimulationUnit. (Can be either a AdHocModule or a CellModule)
